savedQuery.name: list_rejected_connections
savedQuery.query: SELECT day, interface_id, srcaddr, action, protocol FROM   {table_name}    WHERE action = 'REJECT' AND protocol = 6

savedQuery.name: list_top_src_rejected_connections
savedQuery.query: SELECT srcaddr, SUM(bytes) AS total_bytes_transferred FROM {table_name} WHERE action = 'REJECT' AND protocol = 6 GROUP BY srcaddr ORDER BY total_bytes_transferred DESC;

attributes.title: Top Source Addresses for Rejected TCP Traffic by Bytes Transferred

savedQuery.name: TopCommonErrorServicesQuery
savedQuery.query: SELECT pkt_src_aws_service AS source_service, pkt_dst_aws_service AS destination_service, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM {table_name} where log_status IN ('SKIPDATA', 'RETIREDDATA') GROUP BY pkt_src_aws_service, pkt_dst_aws_service ORDER BY error_count DESC LIMIT 10

attributes.title: Top 10 pairs of errored source / destination services
